name: Borry
description:
Borry is a short horror game where you must solve puzzles in attempt to avoid the monster stalking you from the darkness. Use strategy and stealth to escape the killer bear. Stay out of sight, or suffer the consequences. Oh, and remember to turn the oven off...

This is my 8th game ever. It has been in production for 3 months. I hope all that time was worth it, enjoy!

Discord: https://discord.gg/D4XuMnGWcP

YT: Fuzzele - YouTube
